lines.text: Just because people throw it out and don't have any use for it, doesn't mean it's garbage.
Tomorrow it's gonna be with you. Huh, Joe? Please.
You're better than that beer bottle.
We need welfare and you can't have my fucking shoes!
Joe, Let me suck your cock.
Don't touch me, I'm a bleeder!
[Joe getting into his face about not getting welfare]
We don't need you man...we don't need you get the fuck out of here.
You bet I'm gonna get out of here! You're not going to get a dime...quarter... your garbage, low-lifes...you deserve to live like hippies. You should be out there working!
